Bunny Haven

Find your fluffy friend today.

Nestled in the centre of Sutton Park, Bunny Haven is a sanctuary to a fluffle of rabbits. Our fantastic team nurture these loving, charismatic furballs while they await their forever home. If you are looking to adopt a rabbit or rehome a rabbit, you will find that Bunny Haven is the right place for you!

Adopt a bunny!

Netherland Dwarf

Lionhead

Mini Lops

Bunny Haven offers a wonderful variety of rabbits to adopt. From Netherland Dwarf to Lionhead, you are certain to find the one you are looking for.

Visit our adoption page to see our fluffy friends.

You won't be disappointed!

Rehome your bunny.

Deciding to rehome your rabbit is never an easy decision to make. Bunny Haven is here to support you, and make the process as smooth as possible.
